title: Mixed vegetable curry
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons plain yoghurt', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', '1/2 teaspoon garam masala', '4 cardamom pods, bruised', '3 tablespoons ghee', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '2 medium onions, sliced', '2 bay leaves', '2 medium potatoes, chopped', '1 large carrot, sliced', '300g cauliflower florets', '2 baby aubergines, or 1 large', '250ml coconut cream', '150g green beans, halved', '1 teaspoon salt']
